Satisfy.definition: to carry out the terms or obligation of

1 a.definition: to carry out the terms or obligation of (as by payment of money) [refused to the judgment against her] [ a condition precedent]to cause to be discharged, settled, or paid [sought to his claim against the debtor]

sub_terms.b: to meet an obligation to [ a creditor]

2.definition: to convince by argument or evidence
